item.title: Cheney’s funeral expected to draw Bush and GOP’s old guard, not Trump
item.description: The former vice president will be honored at the Washington National Cathedral beginning at 11 a.m.

item.title: As Trump plans backfire, Democrats are ahead in House redistricting fight
item.description: After early redistricting wins, Trump faces setbacks over maps for Texas, Indiana and other Republican-led states, frustrating his allies.

item.title: They retired from the government. Now they’re back, protecting forests Trump abandoned.
item.description: The U.S. Forest Service lost thousands of workers under Trump. Volunteers and retirees are trying to help — but things are breaking.

item.title: Trump-Marjorie Taylor Greene breakup shakes MAGA: ‘Mom and Dad are separated’
item.description: In Greene’s Georgia congressional district, much of the MAGA base has her back against Trump, who has called her a “traitor.”

item.title: Trump to meet New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani on Friday
item.description: The 34-year-old democratic socialist has faced frequent public attacks from the president and has vowed to resist his agenda.
